thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ping An Asset Management Raises Stake In HSBC Holdings - HKEx Filing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ping An Asset Management Raises Stake In HSBC Holdings - HKEx Filing
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - HSBC Holdings Plc :
* PING AN ASSET MANAGEMENT BOUGHT 37.22 MILLION H-SHARES IN HSBC HOLDINGS AT AN AVERAGE PRICE OF HK$79.3774 ($10.15) EACH ON FEB 9 - HKEX FILING
* PING AN ASSET MANAGEMENT'S LONG POSITION AT HSBC HOLDINGS INCREASED TO 6.17 PERCENT STAKE AFTER TRANSACTION FROM 5.98 PERCENT PREVIOUSLY - HKEX FILING Source text in English: bit.ly/2F1Ug31 Further company coverage: ($1 = 7.8221 Hong Kong dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
